name: Kony Marketplace — Tetsuro Okabe (Kony)
quesTitle: The "Work Order Management" is an app. Not a "Collection Library"
quesDetails:
In the marketplace main page, it shows "Category: Collection Library" for this item. But this is not a library and I can't import it into my library. Instead, I can download it as a zip file and I can import it as a project into Visualizer.
It's confusing and should be change the category to "Application" instead.
